text: Soni nganitutumisyeje paujo penu (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) ntenga jwalijose namuno ntume, ni ikaŵeje kuti juchisoomaga, shetani ŵaponyaga (maloŵe gaunami) mu kusooma kwakweko, basi Allah ni ŵafutaga yaŵaponyaga shetaniyo, kaneka Allah ni ŵagalimbanganyaga ma Ȃya Gakwe, sano Allah ni Jwakumanyilila nnope, Jwalunda lwakusokoka
